pages.text: $(li)When a Hammerhead Shark attack a prey, they may loose one Shark Tooth.$(br)$(li)It can be rarely obtained in a trade with a Seal too.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft a Shield of The Deep.
$(li)As Shark Tooths, when a Hammerhead Shark attacks a prey, they may loose one Serrated Shark Tooth.$(br)$(li)It is part of the craft of the SHield of The Deep.
